MDN CSS data

This folder contains data about the different features of the CSS language.

Different types of CSS data

The CSS data is split into these parts:

  • at-rules: data | schema | docs
  • properties: data | schema | docs
  • selectors: data | schema | docs
  • syntaxes: data | schema | docs
  • types: data | schema | docs
  • units: data | schema | docs
